title: Mashin Eiyuuden Wataru: Owarinaki Toki no Monogatari
synopsis: The story is about a 9-year-old boy named Wataru Ikusabe  who is magically transported to a magical realm of the gods called Sokaizan which he is supposed to save. He also befriends many of the Soukaizan natives, and forms some very strong friendship bonds.
related_anime: ['Mashin Eiyuuden Wataru 2', 'Mashin Eiyuuden Wataru: Shichikon no Ryuujinmaru']
staff: [['Iuchi, Shuji', ['Director', ' Script']], ['Negishi, Takayuki', ['Theme Song Arrangement']], ['Oshima, Michiru', ['Music']], ['Yatate, Hajime', ['Original Creator']]]
